title: Hallo alle zusammen
body:
Hello everybody , first of all thanks for opening this link.

So, I´m a new streamer, its going okey, in under 30 days I already got over 30 Followers :)
I dont know if this is much for the short time or not, however I would be very grateful if you
would maybe give me a Chance and you give me a Follow.
So you can know when I´m online and if you dont like my stream you can everytime unfollow me.

 
I´m doing if there is enough People , viewergames etc.
I´m streaming in the language Ger/Eng

Thanks everybody who gives me the chance and have a nice day all 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
